Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post
<!--more-->
``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
Post.raw:
---
title: Hello World
categories: hello
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post
<!--more-->
``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post._content: ### GitgithubcodinggitlabSCM Manager GitGitGitGit ### 1.Git #### 1.1 windowmac ![image-20210716171659048](./image-20210716171659048.png) #### 1.2 1. `ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@example.com"`( ) Enter ```bash $ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "hansen@qq.com" ``` 2. . `start ~/.ssh`id_rsa.pub(linux `open ~/.ssh`) . githubsettings Add SSH keyid_rsa.pub ssh -T git@github.com ![image-20210716093426293](E:\markdown\git\image-20210716093426293.png) #### 1.3 github cd /c/Users/HS/.ssh () 1.2 ```java 1repoemailssh , ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "" 2gitid_rsa_github Enter file in which to save the key (/c/Users/HS/.ssh/id_rsa): id_rsa_github 3 Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): Enter same passphrase again: 4/c/Users/HS/.ssh/id_rsa)id_rsa_githubid_rsa_github.pub 5 id_rsa_gitee ``` ![image-20210716102641483](E:\markdown\git\image-20210716102641483.png) 2. .ssh config ``` #github(user github) Host github.com HostName github.com IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_github User Hansen1994 #gitee(user gitee) Host gitee.com HostName gitee.com IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_gitee User dream1994 ``` ### 2.() -------------------------------------------------------------- `git init` `git add xxx.txt` / `git add . `/() `git commit -m "sss"` -m,sss -----------------------()---------------------------- me: ,balabala,, `git add xxx.txt` -----------------------()--------- me: `git reset HEAD` `git reset HEAD filepathname` `git checkout xxx.txt` ( `git checkout .`) me:() ---------------------()-------------------- me~~ `git log` `git reset --hard git log ------------------()-------------- me: ~~~ `git rm xxx.txt ` `git commit -m "delete xxx"` ### 3. me: 0 ```javascript git init git README.md git commit -m "xxx" -m() git remote add origin git@e.github.net:han1994/dasadasa.git git push -u origin master git pull origin master ``` ### 4. ```javascript git remote -v git remote add origin git@e.github.net:han1994/dasadasa.git git push origin master ``` ### 5. ``` git tag git tag name git tag -a name -m "comment" git tag -d name git push origin name ``` ### 6. #### 6.1 1.`git checkout -b xxx / git checkout xxx` /git branch// 2.`vi a.js`(vilinux`git status``git diff`) 3.`git add . ` // 4.`git commit -m "update part2"` //-m() 5.`git push origin xxx` // --------master-------- 6.`git checkout master` //master 7.`git merge xxx` //xxxmaster 8.`git push origin master` // #### 6.2 2 dev 1. `git stash` 2. `git pull origin dev`, 3. `git stash pop` : git checkout . #### 6.3 vscode ### 7.git resetgit revert #### git reset: commit `git reset --hard HEAD~1` // 22 `git reset --hard `// git log `git push origin HEAD --force `// : #### git revert git revertcommit bug git revert : . `git revert -n` bug . `git commit -m` // . `git push` // : ### 8.git #### 8.1 git ![img](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20191226214801971.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzM4NTg4ODQ1,size_1,color_FFFFFF,t_70) #### 8.2linux 1. `cat` // 2. `touch + ` // 3. `cp ` // 4. `vi ` // 5. `i` 6. `esc + :wq`//
